name: Channel Moderation Settings should not be applied for Channel Admins
objective: Channel Moderation Settings should not be applied for Channel Admins

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)
customFields.Update notes:
Steve Mudie — Thursday, October 01, 2020 4:10 PM
• Set back to Active for manual testing
customFields.Cypress Reports: MISSING - TM4J-Key-Missing-In-Cypress - TM4J key NOT found in any Cypress run reports  (SDET/QA)

inline.description:
1. Login as a sysadmin and remove some permissions on Channel Moderation Settings for a Member like remove following permissions for Members:
Create Posts, Post Reactions, Manage Members, Channel Mentions
2. Login as a Channel Admin and check if user is still able to create post, use reactions, add or remove people from the channel, use special channel mentions like @all, @channel and @here
inline.expectedResult: Channel Admins should still be able to create post, use reactions, add or remove people from the channel, use special channel mentions like @all, @channel and @here
